Excelente juego

This is a one of a kind game. The graphics and physics are really advanced, especially for 2004 standards, the storytelling is incredible, the voice acting and soundtrack is amazing, and the character design is wonderful. Very rarely have I discovered bugs, and that's because garry's mod files were clashing together. If you haven't played this game at all, in the 14 years it's been out, you have a hollow pocket of fat for brains, and you live under a rock. This game is a masterpiece.

Where is Half Life 3?

If you haven't played this game before then you may be in 1 of 3 catagories. 1: You haven't bought the orange box. 2: You just downloaded Steam and only buy free games and play Garry's Mod. or 3: You play on Minecraft Roleplay Servers and whine everytime you get killed during a game of Call of Duty Infinite Warfare, because you still take the INFINITE WARFARE part a little too seriously. And you probabbly live under a rock. (Ok don't take the last one seriously it's a joke ok), But seriously this game is really fun, it has a unique and developing story, lots of diverse gameplay, and you get to go around smacking aliens with a crowbar. It's fun. VERY fun.

Half-Life 2 excels in every category when it comes to good game design. Articulate controls, pitch perfect gameplay, innovative physics, and graphics that have aged perfectly. In my opinion, it's probably the greatest game of all time, or at least it's the greatest shooter of all time. I give it a 10/10.

Ğ£Ğ‘Ğ˜Ğ’ĞĞ¢Ğ¬ Ğ“.Ğ Ğ’Ğ•Ğ¡Ğ•Ğ›Ğ Ğ˜ ĞšĞ Ğ£Ğ¢Ğ))))

Although, I wouldn't say it's the best game ever of all time. I can understand why it was beloved by many gamers and had a crushing impact in the video game industry. It was revolutionary at the time. The unique physics-based gravity gun, a lot of interactive stuff to play with, and includes barely any cutscenes. You get to explore around the room while the characters are talking in-game without messing the flow and change of pacing. The graphics of this game suprised me even if it's a nearly 15 year old game. Even if you look back some old videos, the graphics hasn't changed that much. Presentation will suprise you a look in this game. The intro when you first start the game is the best of all time. LOOK AT THAT FRESH LOGO OF HL2 AND GMAN'S FACE ON IT. Weapons are oddly satisfying and levels are very atmospheric that sticks to your heads building up to the Citadel at the end. Though, it has some problems includes some long chapters that makes it not enjoyable. The combine might be a bit easy to pick off (especially in the end-game). It's not as fast-paced as I might think compared to the original. But does the positive outweighs the negatives? Yes, truly. You should definitely wait for the sales and pick up this game as it's usually very, very cheap. Who doesn't want this game with so immersive quality for under 10 bucks or a dollar for the sale?
